Sequence Information.Peptide Name: EcAMP2.1 (truncated EcAMP2 without five C-terminal residues)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: EcAMP2.1 inhibits spore germination of P. infestans with an IC50 of 24 µM but have no antibacterial activity.

Literature.Title: Defense peptides from barnyard grass (Echinochloa crusgalli L.) seeds.
Literature.Author: Rogozhin EA, Ryazantsev DY, Grishin EV, Egorov TA, Zavriev SK.
